filmDescription: Get data for any given Star Wars movie

filmExtended.extendedHelp: Uses a fuzzy search to match on both movie episode ID (1, 2...6) as well as movie title.
explainedUsage: The movie for which you want to find data
filmExtended.reminder: At the moment only data on the first 6 movies is available. Data in movies 7 through 9 and spin-offs might be added in the future.

filmQueryFail: {{REDCROSS}} I am sorry, but that query failed. Are you sure `{{film}}` is actually a Star Wars movie? At the moment only the first 6 movies are supported. We are working on adding data of the other movies.
personDescription: Get data for any given character in Star Wars

personExtended.extendedHelp: Uses a fuzzy search on the name of the person
explainedUsage: The name of the person for which you want to find data
personExtended.reminder: At the moment only data on the first 6 movies is available. Data in movies 7 through 9 and spin-offs might be added in the future.

personQueryFail: {{REDCROSS}} I am sorry, but that query failed. Are you sure `{{person}}` is actually a person in Star Wars?

explainedUsage: The name of the planet for which you want to find data
planetExtended.reminder: At the moment only data on the first 6 movies is available. Data in movies 7 through 9 and spin-offs might be added in the future.

planetQueryFail: {{REDCROSS}} I am sorry, but that query failed. Are you sure `{{planet}}` is actually a planet in Star Wars?

planetEmbedTitles.orbitalPeriod: Standard Days for planet to orbit around local star
planetEmbedTitles.residents: People who are known to have inhabited this planet
planetEmbedTitles.rotationPeriod: Standard hours for rotating around own axis
planetEmbedTitles.surfaceWaterPercentage: Amount of surface covered by water
